bug.author: vfdev-5
bug.summary: Tensorboard logger won't work with tensorboardX 1.7 (latest release)
bug.description: New release of tensorboardX 1.7 has some <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lanpa/tensorboardX/pull/422/files#diff-0900f72201599ce7d24575f21ca88a85>breaking changes</denchmark-link> that will result in a bug of init : <denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.org/pytorch/ignite/jobs/534870310#L2664>https://travis-ci.org/pytorch/ignite/jobs/534870310#L2664</denchmark-link>
